wikipedia_page.main:
Stuart Davies (born 2 September 1965) is a former Wales international rugby union player.
Davies was born in Swansea.  A back row forward, he played his club rugby for Swansea RFC and attained 17 caps for Wales.
A neck injury sustained in the 1998 Five Nations Championship match against France forced Davies to end his career as a rugby player.Following his retirement, Davies has appeared as a rugby commentator and summariser for BBC and also worked for Gwalia Housing Association. In February 2015, Davies was appointed as chief executive of the Newport Gwent Dragons regional rugby team.
